column4: WINE issue here - I installed a program which created an icon on my desktop (a .desktop file), the contents of which is http://paste.ubuntu.com/373681/ , but I want to add an entry in the regular menu as well, but can't figure out the command to run it - anything but double-clicking that icon gives this error output - http://paste.ubuntu.com/373680/  Ideas?
oddly enough, that opened the .desktop file in GEdit.  (I think that might be a security thing.)
Wow. Well, that was my only guess.
